caption: DISA STIG
description: The DISA STIG object contains information as defined by the Defense Information System Agency (DISA) Security Technical Implementation Guide. A DISA STIG provides technical guidance for securing information systems/software against cybersecurity threats in Department of Defense (DoD) environments.
name: disa_stig

rule.description: The Rule object containing details about the STIG check. This includes the rule name (descriptive title of the check), uid (the unique STIG identifier starting with 'V-', e.g., V-230234), description (vulnerability discussion), and version information.

severity.description: The DISA STIG severity category as defined in the source document. Valid values are: CAT I (maps to severity_id 5/Critical), CAT II (maps to severity_id 4/High), or CAT III (maps to severity_id 3/Medium).

severity_id.description: The normalized severity identifier that maps DISA STIG severity categories to standard severity levels. CAT I maps to 5 (Critical), CAT II maps to 4 (High), and CAT III maps to 3 (Medium).

3.caption: Medium
3.description: Maps to DISA STIG CAT III - Action is required but the situation is not serious at this time.

4.caption: High
4.description: Maps to DISA STIG CAT II - Action is required immediately.

5.caption: Critical
5.description: Maps to DISA STIG CAT I - Action is required immediately and the scope is broad.
